name: Portfolio
tagline: Projects that I have been working on during the last 3 years
body:
Here's a list of the projects I have been working on along with my Resume.

Most of these have been group projects, done in teams of 3 to 8 people from different disciplines.

All the projects are strongly user centered design based, and have been categorized (with some overlap) into the following fields:

*  [Business and Consulting](https://github.com/akhuia/College_Projects/tree/master/Business%20and%20Consulting)
*  [Health](https://github.com/akhuia/College_Projects/tree/master/Health%20Based%20Projects)
*  [UX and Visualization](https://github.com/akhuia/College_Projects/tree/master/UX%20and%20Visualization)
*  [Machine Learning/ Data Science](https://github.com/akhuia/College_Projects/tree/master/Data%20Science)
*  Virtual Reality

## [Resume](https://github.com/akhuia/Resume/blob/master/Resume_AK_UX_PM.pdf)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
